mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS WHERE HAS.site_id>0

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAEI.site_code WHERE 1=1
AND HAEI.type=#{type}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_efm_device` HAED JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAED.site_code WHERE 1=1
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI WHERE HAEI.type=0
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI WHERE HAEI.type=1
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI WHERE HAEI.status=1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_efm_device` WHERE is_online=0
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI WHERE HAEI.status=1 AND HAEI.type=0
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI WHERE HAEI.status=1 AND HAEI.type=1
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI WHERE (HAEI.temp_alarm_en>0 OR HAEI.arc_alarm_en=1 OR HAEI.alive_en=1)
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAEI.site_code WHERE HAEI.status=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT HAB.build_name,COUNT(HAEI.id) equipCount FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_build HAB LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAB.id=HAS.site_build_id LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_equipment_info HAEI ON HAS.site_code=HAEI.site_code
WHERE HAB.id>0
GROUP BY HAB.id )A ORDER BY equipCount DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT HAP.province,COUNT(HAEI.id) equipCount FROM hixent_user.hixent_arc_province HAP LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_equipment_info HAEI ON HAP.province_code=substring(HAEI.site_code ,1,2) GROUP BY HAP.id )A ORDER BY equipCount DESC
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hixent_arc_system.`hixent_arc_equipment_info` HAEI JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAEI.site_code WHERE is_effect=1

SELECT COUNT(HAWL.warning_no) FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list HAWL JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_efm_device HAED ON HAED.id=HAWL.efm_id JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAED.site_code WHERE HAWL.is_deal IN (0,2) AND HAWL.etype =1

SELECT COUNT(HAWL.warning_no) FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list HAWL JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_equipment_info HAEI ON HAWL.eid=HAEI.id JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAEI.site_code WHERE HAWL.is_deal IN(0,2)

sql.if: AND substring(HAS.site_code,1,2)=(SELECT HAP.province_code FROM hixent_arc_province HAP WHERE HAP.id=#{provinceId})
AND substring(HAS.site_code,3,2)=(SELECT HAA.area_code FROM hixent_arc_area HAA WHERE HAA.id=#{areaId} AND HAA.pid=#{provinceId})
